# elementType

**Instance Property**

The data type of the array’s elements.

## Declaration

```swift
var elementType: MTLDataType { get }
```

## Discussion

For information on possible values, see [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDataType].

## Describing the array elements

- **arrayLength**: The number of elements in the array.
- **stride**: The stride between array elements, in bytes.
- **argumentIndexStride**: The stride, in bytes, between argument indices.
